content.detailedDescription:
Hi.....I've just seen a ufo
time:  4:30 pm ndt
tuesday, april 12, 2016
paradise, nfld, canada
situation
    i was in my back yard in paradise, nl, doing some spring cleanup and maintenance. i had just set up my patio table and chairs and had just sat back to relax for a moment when i noticed a helicopter just coming overhead. i watched it go overhead and followed it to the northeast towards the st. john's airport. as i followed the helicopter i  noticed a black dot in the sky close to the helicopters trajectory, which i originally thought was a large bird. i was worried that it might collide with the helicopter. i then noticed that the dot was moving steadily westward and was at a much  greater distance from the helicopter then i originally thought. it was going in a straight line without moving up or down(not bird like) and maintaining a very good speed.  i had just watched a plane come in for a landing and this dot was doing at least 3 to 4 times the apparent speed of that plane. i watched it for about 15 to 20 seconds going in a straight line  westward when it just disappeared north of over belle isle, nl. going  toward holyrood, nl.. i must say at this time that the object was always  below the cloud layer and did not go into the clouds but just blinked out.
     i am an amateur astronomer(past president rasc st. john's centre) with telescopes from 40mm(pst), 6" refractors, 10" lx200, cpc1100 to my 16" meade lightbridge. i know what astronomical events/planets could have been in the sky at that time and there are none that can be noticed at that time of day and in that direction. i am also an avid weather observer(cocorahs member) and know weather phenomena and none come to mind. i also have watched many varieties of planes, civilian and military, crisscross the airspace to the north of my house and this " black dot " was not one of them.  this is not swamp gas, nor thermal inversion, nor light reflection(as it was a dark object) and since i don't see radar, it couldn't be what the radar anomalies could be. what was it? i don't know. notice the lack of alien spacecraft speculation, as i only  what to identify the anomaly. only alien spacecraft are alien spacecraft, and all ufo's are ufo's, until proven otherwise with compelling evidence, and then, might be something else. but, i have never seen this type of object and its actions before, and therefore, is a ufo.

i will try to send a map of the path of the " black dot" later.
content.summary: Watching helicopter saw a black dot to it's left and followed dot until it blinked suddenly out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my back garden for an hour before it happened,as i was watching the meteor showers,a meteor passed over my roof it was very low it had a smoky firey tail and i heard a whooshing sound as it fell.I actually thought that the meteor had landed in my neighbours backgarden wich is 7 doors down from were my house is situated.I then looked back up to the sky and saw what i thought was a cloud but it seemed out of place as the sky was clear and it seemed to low down to be a cloud i then noticed the shape of it and it was like a giant stingray flying(swimming )in the sky about 100 or so feet away from me above my home.It was white then it seemed to go tranclucent i could see that it was also pulscating as its wings for want of a were effortley propelling it along..I watched it for about 30 seconds then it started to fade ,dissapate then it dissappeared.When i saw this i didnt feel any fear or sense of forboding,i felt so calm and serene even,i then went into my house and emailed lon stickler of my exsperience.I dont know if it was just my imagination but i felt so calm i went to bed and practically fell into a peacefull sleep it felt like i had taken a sleeping pill ..Falling asleep like that is out of the ordinary for me as i am a bit of an insomniac..When i woke up next morning i woke up feeling very sad as if i had lost someone,for the rest of the day i felt very whistfull.
content.summary: Watching meteor shower in garden meteor passed very low then saw this thing flying gracefully after meteor hit ground it was as if it was swimming in the sky as it would if it was a real stingray in the ocean.It was very large.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of. the sky and all of a sudden when i took picture it appeared in the frame.
content.summary: I was taking picture of shy and it appeared in shot.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside and saw pulsating light, got binoculars and saw a rapidly blinking light, changing colors.  watched for over a half hour while it did circles, figure eights and fluttered like a leaf dropping.  went and got a camera and tripod.  took many pictures.  went inside to get another camera with video and when i came out it was gone.
content.summary: Saw light through binocs doing circles and figure eights

content.detailedDescription:
No noise burning flame ...
strange
content.summary: Burning flames

content.detailedDescription: Saw the bright light, with an airplane  above it. light was not coming from the plane. the plane moved away object was moving closer. object then dimmed then disappeared.
content.summary: Saw the bright light, with an airplane  above it. light was not coming from the plane. the plane moved away object was moving closer. object then dimmed then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I came out of work and i was walking to drop off my cash. then i looked up and saw that there was three orbs over the falls hovering. they were a glowing yellowish orange colour. since i've always believed in aliens my whole life my mind immediately went to a ufo. after watching for about 5 mins i had to go drop my cash off, and after i finished i went to go back and they were gone. i was really startled but also very thrilled to see.
content.summary: Left work and looked down the hill and saw 3 orbs over the falls

content.detailedDescription: I was at work and came outside because i heard military jets circling over head.  it was sept 24 2009 the day of the g 20 summit in pittsburgh. a few other guys were out there also. i just happened to look straight out to the east and saw a thick but flat dark object hovering on the horizon. it was huge. it then moved slowly right and wobbled or rocked a bit and i lost sight of it as it moved out of my view behind one of our buildings,  a small oil shed across the lot from my shop. i moved left to regain sight of it again and it was gone. i didn't say a word to the others until one of the guys i was with who was on the other side of the building said "did anyone see that big black thing". i then knew i had really seen something and was not imaging it. he and i talked about it for a few minutes while the others were listening and of course they thought we were nuts. this has been on my mind since it happened and i finally decided to say something.
content.summary: Was at work,  heard military jets ,came outside, saw object just above horizon during g 20 summit in pittsburgh

content.detailedDescription:
I saw that the trail being left by a plane looked like it was going into sun. i thought i would make an interesting /funny picture, so i took a few. i went to show them to my wife the next day and noticed the sphere in the pictures. no idea what it is, but it looks like it actually has lights on it.
this took place at kalmus beach in hyannis, massachusetts at around 515pm while walking my dog.I never noticed the object while taking the pictures.
content.summary: Noticed sphere in photos the day after i took the photos. i have no idea what it is and did see it when taking the pictures.

content.detailedDescription: I viewed and photographed this light in the sky that changed shape for about nine minutes before i watched it ascend up. i checked the iss and it was in over asia at the time and then i checked for weather balloon activity, none. i then felt as though i caught a ufo!
content.summary: I opened the curtins for the day in the bedroom and looked out the window and saw a very bright light that did not look like a star so i got the camera.

content.detailedDescription:
1 eu tinha ido a cidade de crato-ce buscar uma prima que tinha ficado muito doente. na epoca era estudante e me preparava para o vestibular. meu horarario de aula era de 18:30 as 22:00. sai uns 10 minutos antes da aula para que podesse evitar o tumulto da saida da cidade do crato pelos onibus universitarios. passei na casa onde minha prima estava e peguei ela, o pai dela e a mae dela. saimos por volta das 22:15 da cidade rumo a nossa casa que fica na cidade de mauriti-ce

2 quando chegamos em uma parte do percurso, proximo a cidade de misso velha, avistamos uma luz branca se destacava facilmente das outras no desenho da cidade. quando mais iamos chegando perto da cidade viamos que na verdade esse ponto de luz ficava cada vez mais forte e que na verdade ele se localisava fora da cidade.

dd3 naquela epoca foi a epoca da explosão das torres de telefonia gsm, praticamente todo dia tinha uma torre nova onde antes n havia nada. qua do vi delonge, achei que era a luz de sinalização. depois concluir que não,  porque  esses luzes sao vermelhas e aquela era de um branco cegante.

4 depois de mais ou menos 1 km da zona urbana da cidade, no sentido da cidade de milagres-ce, nos deparamos com um enorme luz branca cegante a uns 3 metros fora da pista e a uns  6 metros de altura. ficamos com o carro parado bem embaixo dessa luz, desligamos o veiculo e saimos do carro os 4e ficamos bem embaixo  desse corpo iluminado. estava tao baixo que quase dava p pegar com os dedos se pulasse. me abaixei e peguei uma pedrinhas p ver o que acontecia se eu acertasse. mas nao joguei, alguma  coisa não  me deixou. ficamos la parados por varios minutos. curioso é que essa rodovia é super movimentada, mas nesse periodo mais ninguem passou. meu tio, pai da menina que estava levando, nos balancou pelos ombros, quase que tirando a nos de um transe. entramos dentro do carro e saimos ainda pasmos e sem entender o que seria aquilo

5 quando chegamos meu sentimentos era de se perguntar se eu nao estava sonhando, perguntei aos outro que estavam  no carro se eles estavam  vendo o mesmo que eu. quando sai e fiquei embaixo dele coberto pela luz , que de tao forte mudou a cor da nossa pele, a sencacao  era de estrema paz e socego. n sentia quase nada do pescoço  pra baixo. so depois de alguns minutos, quando fui balançando pelo meu tio foi que voltei a me sentir e novamente senti os pe  no chao.

6 somente perdemos o obijeto de vista porque meu tio, que ficou meio apavorado com aquilo tudo, praticamente botou todos dentro do carro aos empurrões.  depois de uns 100 metros pegamos uma ladeira e perdemos o objeto de vista.

ps. peco que venha a nossa regiao e investigue esse e outros muitos casos que estao sendo ignorados pelo nosso governo, pelo simples fato de n ter a quem se reportar. somos do interior do ceara, um estado pequeno e pobro do brasil. se a mufon tem problemas em grandes cetros com radar, equipamentos, verbas e todas as facilidades que vcs tem. imagine nos aqui. nas comunidades mais isoladas da minha cidade, contos, historias de luz, pousos,mascas no solo, circulos nas plantacoes e muitas outras. por favor s3jam a nossa voz para o mundo saber que isso acontece com muita frequencia aqui tambem. espero que possam de alguma forma nos ajudar quanto a isso.
content.summary: A noite ficou mais clara que o dia.

content.detailedDescription: I am on a mobile phone and do not have much time to type but i will attach my photo from that morning. one will be zoomed in and another will be without zoom, yet can still be zoomed in to see the glowing saucer. i've seen it 4 times in total since the week before april 4th. please note that the object is hovering below the mountain in the background. it is not a weather balloon, helicopter, or satellite!
content.summary: This was my 2nd time seeing a ufo on my way to work.

content.detailedDescription: Lying in bed,looking up into clear blue sky i observed an object speed into my sight .It was bouncing and zig zaging and turning abruptly,heading back the other way,then bouncing and speeding around as if it was playing as if in joy.It continued this activity as i tried to gauge it's size and height in the sky.I sat up and at that point i was exactly in the window,my bed being right against the window.I made a move to go off the bed and the object stopped it's zig zaging and turned at a high rate of speed into the direction i first observed it to come.The 2nd time i saw this ball, it flew right straight over the tops of the trees and disappeared into a corner over the trees.It was 3x's the size of a basket ball,was solid flew straight (no rolling)and had a slight rosy glow reflecting the sun.I was sitting in a lawn chair with the trees on my right,and i saw it out of the corner of my eye then clearly in front of my face as it swept over the trees.The first sighting the object seemed to be an aware and self directing object as i have said it seemed to be playing in the sky,and i felt it saw that i had seen it through the window and sped away as i got up from the bed to go out side to get a closer look.It was higher up in the sky the first sighting,but i was able to gauge it's size better the second sighting.I hope to spot this amazing thing again!What ever could this be?
content.summary: In sky skipping,zig zaging turning abruptly wide arcs and bouncing as if in play

content.detailedDescription: Was driving and saw hovering lights. was talking on the phone ant told other person.  debated and decided to try to take a pic but in the two blocks it took to turn around it was completely gone. about a few minutes later saw a airplane to north of were ufo was but at higher altitude.
content.summary: Hovering and decided to turn around. took two blocks to turn but gone.   lights on back were triangle white. one single red flash. at least 3 clumped lights at front. driving.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped onto the balcony and automatically caught my eye. it looked like a star but was bigger and closer. instantly intrigued. then in equal steps it started getting bigger. in about 5 equal steps it seemed to take on an actual shape. suddenly i was staring at an iridescent cylinder shaped object, mouth open, in complete awe and disbelief. it was made of light, purple, dark green in colour. then, just as it had grown in equal steps, up to the size of about a quarter moon, it began decreasing in size also in equal steps, about 5 again. my first thought when it began getting smaller was no!!!. when it finally disappeared into the black sky, i could decipher that that was far away and when it was at its biggest, i would say it was definitely in our atmosphere. i began crying because i was so completely stunned and didn't know what to make of it. i had just gotten off the phone with my real estate agent and had sold my condo. i was unsure if i had made the right desicion. the way i see it, whatever it was, was waiting there for me to come out on the balcony. it just kind of said "hello" and then left. i could tell it had consciousness because it changed it shape for me to view. i would spend a lot of time outside and actually consider this proof of what i would call "watchers". sad it left, if it happens again, i will be less scared and try to get it to stay, sending positive thoughts. it would consider it more of a spiritual experience than a mechanical ufo experience. it has boggled my mind ever since. we are just a small part of the galactic family. the entire experience only lasted 15-20 seconds, i kick myself for not having my phone with me. people think i'm crazy when i tell them. lol, it will always be one of the most amazing moments of my life. i plan on going out to look for more. like steven greer talks about.
content.summary: Looked like star. then it grew. became iridescent cylinder. then left atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: On april 6, 2016, at 5:53am in downtown cleveland, ohio, i was walking from the parking garage over to my work and i noticed some lights in the sky. i looked up facing west and i saw an unidentified flying object hovering in the sky. when i first saw it i thought it was a helicopter or something, but i kept watching and it never moved. then a few minutes into the recording, an airplane flew past and it still didn’t move and i could tell then that it wasn’t a helicopter or plane. it was large and black with red and white lights. the red light was blinking continuously. i was recording for approximately 11 minutes and 23 seconds and it never moved. a little while after it headed west in a straight formation until it wasn’t visible any longer. i was baffled and surprised. i was wondering what it could have been. there were others looking in disbelief also wondering what it was.
content.summary: While walking from the parking garage to my work, i noticed an object hovering in the sky. it was large and black with white and red lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was setting up my telescope when i looked up and saw this big thing above the pine trees.It was about 500 to 700 ft above the pine trees.I was about 75 ft from the pine trees.This thing was about 300 hundred long.There was a small object in front of it as if it was leading it.The small object had a dim red light on it.The large one had 3 dim white lights on it.Both were completely silent.I watched them until i could see them anymore.The night was dark,no moon
content.summary: Don't know if is one of ours are one of theirs

content.detailedDescription:
Large trace de plasma de 450 pieds de long sous l'eau, proche des cã´tes d'israã«l,en plus d'un avion de ligne de type boeing 737-400, juste en face sous l'eau, voir google earth, 32â°7'41.48"n, 34â°46'11.10"e. 

observation faite via google earth. j'ai dã©couvert plusieurs objets ã  ce jour mais celui-ci montrant un aã©ronef connu, surtout sous l'eau, je me devais de l'indiquer du moins ã  un organisme connu impliquã© dans ce genre d'observation ou ã©vã¨nement.

ã  ce jour, j'ai observã© ã  trois reprises des ovnis en rã©el mais n'ayant pas assez d'informations exactes sur les informations tel que les dates et heures, je n'en ai pas parlã©. sur google earth, j'ai environ une vingtaine d'observation d'ovnis avec trace de plasma de retracã©, mais cette derniã¨re avec la prã©sence de l'avion me fatiguais un peu plus.
content.summary: Objet en forme de cigare d'une longueur d'environ de 450 pieds de longueur.

content.detailedDescription: Shooting shots of sun did not notice object until uploaded on computer.
content.summary: Shot with fuji finepix j10 8.2 pixels

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We were at the hotel in kemer- antalya. sitting and talking with the family. shiny object with strange move. we thought it was a helium filled metallic balloon. it moved north first and then came back and hovered above the sea. i suprised and then took 5 shot with my canon 450d with zoom lens. when you look at the pictures it was like a door opened at the end of the photos it becomes the known ufo shape and vanished. i said vanished because when i try to take 6th photo i could not find it anymore.
content.summary: Over the sea. first strange move to n. then came back to ne hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I saw this 2 object in the clear sly at 5-5;30 pm from my house. one of these object was like a sheap and the other was like a ball and they are moving in the sky sometimes very fast and sometimes very slowly for this reason i did the pics about them. 
i saw them along 15-20 minutes very clearly .
content.summary: Ufos in the clear sky las americas

content.detailedDescription:
I was hiking with a friend of mine in the teide national park and we saw this object landed on the ground on the top of the hill. it was very strange object, no sound, no light, no noise, nobody being. 
we saw this object long 5 minutes and i did some pictures. 
this object was grey color with a cristal top.
content.summary: Ufo landed on teide national park

content.detailedDescription:
Never thought to report this even though experienced audibly by about 10 other people as we all gathered in parking lot looking up to see what was so huge sounding and moving slowly in sky, almost hovering for a while.  it was audible but no one, including myself could see an actual vessel.  it was as if it were cloaked because the clouds in the sky were minimal.  after a span it timecit continued until out of range of audible identification.

recently, when viewing videos of similar occurrances within a similar frame of time in year and distance of reported sightings only reinforced what i and about 10 others who were grouped in the parking lot in my location had been witness to; (audible, not actual visually recordable),

therefore, unless anyone else took time to report this event, you now may add statesville, nc to the list of areas on record which experienced this phenomena.  

sorry there is little more that can validate this than as is written here.


desire to remain anonymous and confidential.  thank you.

remember this so well because was just before 4th of july and the tent for fireworks was in parking lot and i and the clerk tried to get a visual sighting and we listened to the huge heavy roar of the vessel slowly passing overhead/hovered few moments.  we both were very perplexed as were others in parking lot until the thing passed over the area.

then we started joking about the movie, independence day, only what was experienced really wasn't funny but very much real and many witnesses to validate the fact.  just don't know anyone to contact unless the newspaper ran an ad for witnesses that day and by now most, like me, just rather forget it then linger on something we could not put visual and audio validation to in order to prove what we were witness to.
content.summary: Came out of store with cart, waiting for cars to pass, noticed sound in sky, at first to the west, thought it to be a huge low flying jet.  other people started to gather in parking lot because noise was loud, like something huge but moving ne very slowly

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was fixing my roomates back window screen on her bmw and i never had a problem ever fixing it in the past but she kept asking me if i needed help and i wasn't fully aware of me not responding to hers
2. we first noticed the v shaped ufo with no lights on but i counted 12 lights that weren't on and it was almost stealth like and my energy felt drained and i grabbed her leg and we both looked in the sw of the sky and froze
3. a ufo
4. it was hovering at a slow speed and low enough to count the lights and it was headed from the sw toward the ne where the moon located and it was going in a perfectly straight line to the moon. 
5. i feel not like myself nor does my roomate. i can't eat, i'm shakin still. the energy from that craft was evil. i'm not feelin clear minded or even like i'm in the right body. i'm sober and don't so drugs or drink and i know they did something to me and her.
6.As soon as it past over us toward its mission to what i suspect heading to the moon it all of a sudden got cloudy and we were no longer able to see it.
content.summary: Energy shifting then i was frozen

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were sitting on her back screened in porch.  i looked directly across from us and saw a large bright red object through the trees.  i got up and walked approximately 10 feet to get a better view and the object looked as large as the house below it and looked so bright red that it appeared like a ball of fire.  the sphere shaped object was hovering around the tree tops right behind power lines.  within seconds, it backed up slowly and then took off backwards very fast and instantly disappeared.  i have never seen any type of object before in my 45 years on this earth and up to this sighting, not sure if i really believed in other people's sighting.  the night before this happened, we were all going to sleep, and the whole house started swaying back and forth. it feeler like tremors.  the house is built off the ground on stilts because it is next to water and is a flood zone. it moved enough that it shook our beds.  this went on in intervals of about 3 minutes, repeating over and over for approximately 20 minutes.  four days after the sighting, my sister said she heard what sounded like a roaring sound.  she heard birds chirping uncontrollably and she went outside and the floor of the screen porch felt like it was vibrating.  she never saw anything, but she wouldn't leave the porch area.  this lasted approximately 20 minutes.  however, the birds continued to chirp for hours.  this happened approximately 11:30pm.
content.summary: Large fire like glowing object.  hovered, then went slowly backwards, shot backwards and disappeared instantly.

content.detailedDescription:
Taking pics of our hot tub around 10 pm. at the time i was not aware of any object. next day when reviewing the pics on my canon sure shot camera i saw the images.   i recently "rediscovered" them on my computer picture files and thought to send it to mufon.
this location would have been same path under the phoenix lights observed in 1997 i think.
content.summary: Taking pic of hot tube.  did not see object until i reviewed photos next day

content.detailedDescription: White light popped out of cloud deck,descended straght down,went from white to orange red,never went back to white,due north of me,wasnt helo,looked at it thru decent pair of binos,if i had to guess if it continued down ,straight down,somewhere north of fm 78,in line with montgomery rd.
content.summary: Light decended out of clouds straght down in a what looked like. controlled descent,lite changef colors from wht to orangr to red

content.detailedDescription: The first one i saw in the driveway just over the neighbors cattle field,gee isn't that ideal,i was watching the plane take off when it dove down and i saw something light and much brighter make sharp turns over or around it in avoidance. the second was in town after the airport and after jci.This appeared as an orb and seemed to cloak itself within he surrounding sunset.It appeared to hover for a while and when we went under the overpass it was out of my field of view.The strange color discription is reason to believe it was trying to cloak itself.The third was just down the road while i was walking west ,it was a massive object with two arches illuminated by the sunlight as if they were chrome.This object as i remember evaded my picture taking by ducking behind a cloud after making a spiral shaped movement. the last was in the same place a few weeks later but just a week ago. i was already taking photos when i noticed what appeared to be a helicopter.But when i caught it in zoom appeared nothing of the kind. of course i managed to get a picture and last thursday a sound caught on video.People explained to me this was the sound of the tornado alarm testing.It clearly is not and i do swear a bit in the video as i had just stepped outside to investigate the insanely loud noise
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Four times,one swerved out of way of plane,two and three orb over town and glisten by house.

content.detailedDescription: Left my home travelling north and got stopped at a traffic light. then i saw this object through my windshield. i live halfway between the denver airport and the downtown area, and regularly see planes at lower elevations as they get near/leave the airport. i saw the object, which was flying at a standard height for a plane leaving the airport. i was close enough to make out the detail of it. it looked like a large white cargo plane, but with no wings, tail, and had a round front. by the time i grabbed my phone to take a photo the view of object was now out the drivers side window to the south west. i was able to get one photo then the light turned green and i had to drive on. the object was closer when i first saw it, but flow off pretty fast in a straight line to the south west.
content.summary: Saw flying cigar shaped whited object about the size of a cargo plane.

content.detailedDescription: Me and stepson walked out of house to our other house to bring paint for putting it up for rental market.Between the houses we have a small paved road 250-300feet long.Running parallel is the treeline about 40 feet high and150 feet from road.As we walked down stepson asked if i noticed " the thing" under the moon.Didn't pay attention and remarked.Oh yeah it a 🌙 moon tonight.He said no.Under it the light under the moon.I had to focus my eye to the object and there it was.A small luminus speck at 7 o'clock position under the moon.I thought it might be a satellite from japan china indie etc.But this thing over the span of 10 mins is not in a orbiting track.It is holding position at 7 o'clock.A white hue at the 11 o'clock to 3 o'clock position of object.The rest of object wavered in ccolor like atmosphere temperature variations causes stars to alter colors.Stepping out now 9:00 ok and moon defended ant it's still holding position.Wife has stepped in from rental and told me she had seen it also.
content.summary: Shimmering sphere at 7 o'clock position at the moon white glare at top of object due to moons reflection.Stays in track as moon decends on horizon
